TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Payljus, title = Payljus, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Payljus} }

S.FORM: Payljus Itiniay i Laiyi Cen no Pingtung ko Payljus a niyaro', 217 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 664 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 97 ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 644 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 3 ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 20 ko tamdaw. O pa sin to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Paiwan95 , Amis1 , roma2 . Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
